revision.comment: RadiculousJ moved page [[Talk:DSR-Precision GmbH DSR-1]] to [[Talk:DSR-Precision DSR-1]]: Ltd., LLC, GmbH, etc. are not included in firearms article titles.
revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Firearms|class=Start|importance=Low|attention=y|B-Class-1=n|B-Class-2=n|B-Class-3=y|B-Class-4=y|B-Class-5=y}} {{WikiProject Germany|class=Start|importance=Low|attention=y|unref=|B-Class-1=n|B-Class-2=n|B-Class-3=y|B-Class-4=y|B-Class-5=y}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=Start |B1 =n |B2 =n |B3 =y |B4 =y |B5 =y |Weaponry=y|German=y}} }} == Dead link == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://USP.lu ** In [[FN 303]] on 2011-03-18 13:20:48, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' ** In [[Heckler & Koch HK69A1]] on 2011-03-24 00:34:20, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' ** In [[Heckler & Koch HK69A1]] on 2011-03-26 03:22:28, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' ** In [[AMP Technical Services DSR-1]] on 2011-06-20 00:43:53, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 00:44, 20 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 2 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.policia.es/geo/material.htm?reload_coolmenus ** In [[Grupo Especial de Operaciones]] on 2011-03-22 14:44:11, 404 Not found ** In [[Heckler & Koch MP5]] on 2011-03-24 00:35:01, Socket Error: 'A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond' ** In [[Heckler & Koch MP5]] on 2011-03-26 03:23:11, 404 Not found ** In [[.338 Lapua Magnum]] on 2011-05-20 21:36:52, 404 Not found ** In [[.338 Lapua Magnum]] on 2011-05-31 12:38:31, 404 Not found ** In [[AMP Technical Services DSR-1]] on 2011-06-20 00:44:32, 404 Not found --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 00:45, 20 June 2011 (UTC) == Rifle made again, is for sale. == Hi, I'm not editor, but the DSR-1 is being made on license by DesertTech, you can see in their store here: http://deserttech.com/guns/dta-srs-covert-sniper-rifle-chassis.html They also make the fifty caliber copy here. http://deserttech.com/guns/dta-hti-sniper-rifle-chassis.html I am not a worker of this company, I am only excited to see it for sale again! I want others to know too. [[Special:Contributions/71.175.199.160|71.175.199.160]] ([[User talk:71.175.199.160|talk]]) 23:00, 19 January 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[DSR-Precision GmbH DSR-1]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=730762063 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/19970330143007/http://www.discovery.com/ to http://www.discovery.com/ *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20110722160041/http://www.usp.lu/media/raids.pdf to http://www.usp.lu/media/raids.pdf When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 23:53, 20 July 2016 (UTC)
